name: flicknpress
author: Brian Link

sections.description: flicknpress is a WordPress plugin that lets you attach a cropped photo from Flickr right inside your blog post.
sections.installation:
1. Upload flicknpress to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Can I search through only the photos on my personal Flickr account?

The flicknpress plugin does not currently support searching by individual user.
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Added support for different Attribution licenses.
  • Minor markup changes.

1.0

  • Initial version.

short_description: flicknpress is a WordPress plugin that lets you attach a cropped photo from Flickr right inside your blog post.
description: flicknpress is a WordPress plugin that lets you attach a cropped photo from Flickr right inside your blog post.

upgrade_notice.1.1: Version 1.1 allows you to break your search down by various Attribution licenses. Anyone interested in not stepping on some photographer's toes should upgrade.
